name: Hudson Quest
description:
Can Hudson make it home in time for dinner?

Use Arrow Keys to move

Use x Key to view inventory and make menu selections

 = Closed Trap Door - This is safe for Hudson to stand on

  = Open Trap Door - Don't fall on this tile!

  =Key - Use this to open doors

= Door - Requires 1 key to open

= Hudsons favourite bone

 = Charlie the cat - Hudsons Older Sibling

  = Pushkin the cat - Hudsons Older Sibling

   = Cleo the Dog - Hudsons Mentor
